Credits

As of 2016, this library is maintained by Scientific Volume Imaging:

Scientific Volume Imaging Holding B.V.
Laapersveld 63, 1213 VB Hilversum, The Netherlands

This library was originally written and maintained by

Cris Luengo
(previously at) Delft University of Technology, Delft, NL

With help from

  • Bert Gijsbers, Scientific Volume Imaging BV, Hilversum, NL (Most changes for version 1.3)
  • Fons Laan, Hubrecht Laboratorium, Utrecht, NL (SCIL_Image compatability, MAKE files, bug fixes)
  • Frank de Jong, Delft University of Technology, Delft, NL (IcsViewer utility improvements)
  • Peter Verveer, EMBL, Heidelberg, Germany (autoconf/automake script)
  • David Svoboda, Masaryk University, Brno, Czech Republic (Windows make files)
  • Glenn Pierce (Idea of opening in "rw" mode and history iterator)

Most of the code herein hasn't changed since the previous version, by

Dr. Hans T.M. van der Voort
Scientific Volume Imaging Holding B.V.
Laapersveld 63, 1213 VB Hilversum, The Netherlands

Which ultimately is based upon stuff written by:

Damir Sudar, Geert van Kempen, Jan Jitze Krol, Chiel Baarslag, Fons Laan and Hans van der Voort.

Compression is realized with zlib version 1.1.3 or newer.
